title: Blog
description: This is my personal website where I showcase my work as well as share a few tricks and code snippets. I wanted a way to create a post with markdown and provide a way to copy code from the post.
implementation: The backend is a Laravel Sanctum API and the frontend is a React App built on Next Js. I have used Tailwind CSS as it's perfect for a one-man team.

title: Online captions editor
description: This is a captions editor that allows a user to upload caption files and edit them online or create new transcripts entirely. As it is designed for in-house use, there is not video/audio upload.
implementation: The media manipulation and waveform creation is done using wavesurfer JS. Alpine Js is used to present captions data. Tailwind CSS for styling.

title: Project wizard
description: This is a small application that enables a user to create a transcription/captioning project giving deadlines and and instructions on formating among. Users can drag and drop files or enter a URL.
implementation: This application relies on a linked list to add and remove the files and URLs. Alpine JS is used to presend the data and Tailwind CSS for styling.

title: Shopeet
description: This is an upcoming e-commerce project. Just a simple shop that sells electronic gadgets. It uses Stripe  for checkout. COMING SOON.
implementation: It's built React on NextJS and RTK Query to save and persist data. Tailwind CSS is also used for styling.
